item.title: A React Typescript Trivia Quiz
item.description: This is a simple React + TypeScript + Storybook application, it’s a trivia quiz where the user answers a question and when all the questions are finished, they can see their score and the correct answers. In this blog, I will go over the most important parts of the code, which you can find here. Handling the data received from the API The code is in api/quizz-api.ts. The first thing to do is to create a type that handles the response returned by the API.
